description:
Get forecasts up to 16 days ahead, with detailed hour-by-hour data for the next 96 hours. Customize the experience to focus on what matters most to you — from temperature and precipitation to wind, humidity, UV index, and air quality. Explore real-time radar maps to track rain, snow, ice and cyclones in your area. Stay notified about today’s conditions and tomorrow’s outlook.
Whether you’re planning a busy week, heading outdoors, or just wondering if you’ll need a jacket, this app delivers accurate, reliable weather — fast and easy to read.
Optimized for both iPhone and iPad, with adaptive layouts to provide the best experience across all screen sizes.

# Accurate Forecasts
Stay informed with 16-day extended forecasts and 96-hour hourly breakdowns. Access key data like temperature, rain probability, wind speed and direction, cloud cover, humidity, UV index, and more — all in a single view.

# Interactive Radar Maps
Track rain, snow, ice, and cyclones in real time with high-resolution radar. Follow weather patterns around you and anticipate changes before they happen.

# Real-Time Air Quality
Keep an eye on air quality with detailed AQI readings, including PM2.5, PM10, ozone, nitrogen dioxide, carbon monoxide, and sulfur dioxide levels — updated live and presented clearly.

# Customizable Interface
Make the app your own. Choose the metrics you want to display, rearrange forecast blocks, switch between metric and imperial units, and set morning and evening weather reports at your preferred time.

# Notifications
Get timely alerts with daily summaries for the current day and upcoming forecasts — so you’re always a step ahead.

# Multiple Locations
Check the weather in all your favorite places. Your current location updates automatically using GPS, with quick access to saved locations around the world.

# Designed for Clarity
Every detail is organized for ease of use, whether you’re a casual user or a weather power user. A clean, modern interface makes checking the forecast feel effortless.


***

Some features, including Interactive Radar Maps and Real-Time Air Quality, are available with a paid subscription (3 days free, then $12.99/month or $29.99/year).

Privacy Policy: https://www.apptico.fr/weather/privacy-policy
Terms and Conditions: https://www.apptico.fr/weather/terms-and-conditions
EULA: https://www.apptico.fr/weather/eula

A UNIQUE WEATHER FORECAST VISUALISATION
While most weather forecasting apps rely only on free global models, Windy has gone a few steps further and invested heavily in the most accurate models available, always at the highest possible resolution, to ensure accurate weather forecasts. 

WEATHER RADAR & SATELLITE IMAGERY
A weather radar is the most requested tool for weather forecasting. To provide the most accurate radar imagery, we constantly expand our resources so that rain, snow, and storms don't catch you by surprise. Trusted sources include NOAA, Met Office, AROME, DWD, JMA, ACCESS, and others.

MORE THAN 50 WEATHER MAPS AND TOOLS

- Wind forecast (current speed, gusts, accumulation, models comparison, data from weather stations)
- Temperature, humidity, pressure, dew point, freezing altitude
- Rain, thunder, storms, precipitation type, CAPE-index
- Weather radar and Satellite images (blue, infrared, visible)
- Clouds, clouds tops, clouds base and visibility (LIFR, IFR, MVFR, VFR), fog
- Waves, swell, currents
- Solar activity maps (solar power, UV index, wet-bulb temperature)
- Snow depth, new snow, snow density
- NO2, PM 2.5, Aerosol, SO2, Ozone layer, Surface ozone, CO concentration, Dust mass
- Weather warnings & Extreme forecast 
- Soil moisture, Moisture anomaly, Drought intensity, Fire Danger, Fuel Moisture

Available global weather models and resolution: 
- ECMWF
- GFS by NOAA 
- ICON by DWD 

Available local weather models
- HRRR by NOAA
- NAM by NOAA 
- HRDPS by MSC 
- ICON-EU by DWD
- ICON-D2 by DWD
- UKV by British Met Office
- AROME-HD by Météo France
- ALADIN by CHMI
- NEMS by meteoblue
- MSM by JMA
- ACCESS-C by Australian BoM


CUSTOM WEATHER ALERTS
- Want to know about essential weather forecasts before everyone else? Set up a custom alert based on the weather in your favorite location. Whether it's wind strength, precipitation, or temperature.

HURRICANE TRACKING, STORM TRACKING
With Windy's hurricane tracking tool, you can track a hurricane's past and projected path. Windy doesn't rely on just one hurricane model but will give you all the forecasts available for a storm or hurricane.

WEATHER WIDGETS for iOS, iPadOS, MacOS
Windy serves up a quick weather overview on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac, as well as live radar by NOAA, Met Office, Meteo France, DWD, JMA, ACCESS, and many other trusted sources. You can choose from several view sizes and types. 3-5 day forecast, live weather radar, live satellite, or a simple lock screen overview.

TOOLS MADE FOR PILOTS
- 16 altitude levels from the surface to 13.5km/FL450
- 50k+ Airports searchable by ICAO and IATA, including runway info, decoded & raw METARs, TAFs and NOTAMs
- Detailed Airgram and Meteogram
- Thermals forecast 
- Meteogram: temperature and dew point, wind speed and wind gusts, pressure, precipitation, altitude cloud cover
- Route planner 

WINDY FOR APPLE WATCH
Forecast, radar, METARs, and wind information in a small, lovely package.
Use the Apple Watch face by Windy.com to have it all on your screen anytime. 

Terms of Use: https://account.windy.com/agreements/windy-terms-of-use
Privacy Policy: https://account.windy.com/agreements/windy-privacy-policy

GET IN TOUCH with Windy
Join us at community.windy.com to discuss weather-related topics, report bugs, or suggest a new feature. Or contact us at info@windy.com on any topic.

FOLLOW Windy ON SOCIAL MEDIA
- Facebook: facebook.com/windyforecast
- X: X.com/windycom
- Threads: https://www.threads.net/@windy_forecast
- Instagram: instagram.com/windy_forecast
- YouTube: youtube.com/@Windyforecast

Moon Phases Calendar - universal lunar calendar for any Locations from 0001 to 2100 years.

Lunar calendar is one of the oldest calendars in modern society.
A lunar month can only be 29 or 30 days long. This is different than a solar based calendar, where the length is arbitrarily fixed.

Features:
- Moonrise
- Moonset
- Moon phases
- Lunar Days
- Illumination
- Distance
- Position

+Bonus:
- Sunrise
- Sunset
- Altitude
- Azimuth
- Distance

Languages:
- English
- Russian

How it use:
- View day info: tap on "Day number"
- Change year on Calendar: tap on year number


Unlock calendar subscription:
 Your subscription will renew automatically each year and payment will be charged to your iTunes Account within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. You can turn off auto-renewal by going to your Account Settings after purchase.

http://gv-apps.com/TheMoonTermsOfUse.html

Privacy Policy: 
http://gv-apps.com/appsPrivacyPolicy.html

Real-time radar images, severe weather alerts, accurate weather forecasts and much more - precise & timely to help keep you safe!
 
STAY INFORMED:
- Radar overlay shows the areas of rain, snow & mixed precipitation in high resolution and vivid colors right on the interactive map;
- Precipitation map provides precipitation forecast for the next 24 hours; 
- Satellite map illustrates the cloud cover;
- Choose background maps (standard, hybrid, satellite), search locations, add them to bookmarks and stay out of harm’s way.

KEEP YOURSELF SAFE:
- Read weather alerts with all the details you might need; 
- Receive push notifications whenever there’s a weather alert for the bookmarked location.

VIEW WEATHER DETAILS:
- 24-hour and 7-day forecast;
- Current, today’s min & max and "Feels Like" temperature;
- Pressure, humidity, wind speed, visibility, dew point info;
- Chance of Precipitation;
- Sunrise & sunset time.

Coverage Info:
Radar images: the US (Continental US, Alaska (except northern), Hawaii, Northern Mariana Islands and Puerto Rico), Mexico (northern), Canada (southern), Australia, the UK, Ireland, Germany, France, the Netherlands, Italy (northern and north-western), Denmark, Austria, Sweden, Finland, Spain, Portugal, Switzerland, Norway, Poland, Andorra, Japan and more. See the full list on the developer’s website.
Precipitation, temperature, satellite maps; wind map; snow depth forecast; hurricane, wildfire, lightning trackers; detailed weather info, precipitation alerts: most of the world.
Governmental severe weather warnings: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Japan, Latvia, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, UK.

Get Clime Premium:
- Severe weather alerts for all saved locations
- Hurricane tracker
- Advanced precipitation forecast
- Lightning tracker
- Temperature map
- Rain alerts
- Air quality index
- Wildfire tracking
- RainScope
- Hourly forecast
- 14-day forecast
- Animated wind map
- Snow depth forecast 
- No ads 

Subscription payments will be charged to your App Store account at confirmation of your purchase.  Subscriptions will automatically renew and you will be charged unless auto-renew is turned off or unless you cancel at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription or trial period.  Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a premium subscription during the free trial period. The cost of renewal depends on the Subscription Plan you choose. 
Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase or by contacting Customer Support.

Detailed wind and weather forecasts for your location. 
See wind, waves, tides and weather reports and current wind measurements for your own weather predictions. Easy to use and free of charge.


FEATURES:

+ Detailed wind and weather forecasts for over 160,000 locations
+ Current wind and weather measurements in real-time from 21,000 weather stations
+ Tide forecasts with high and low tide based on 20,000 tide stations
+ Configure your favorites: save nearby spots and monitor the weather for your vacation
+ Animated wind map for a global wind overview
+ Small Wind Widgets (current conditions)
+ New: Severe weather warnings for Europe and the US
+ Measurements listed in knots, Beaufort, mph, km/h and m/s
+ Parameters: Wind speed, wind direction, gusts, air temperature, felt temperature, clouds coverage, precipitation, air pressure, wave height, wave period and wave direction
+ Webcams worldwide
+ Optimized display for optimal readability on the go and on any mobile device
+ Optimized data transfer for a quicker load speed
+ Topographic maps provide a quick overview of weather conditions and help with route planning
+ Easy to use interface - even with cold hands


PERFECT FOR:

• Kitesurfing & Windsurfing – find that next storm or windy days next door or at your next vacation
• Sailing – plan your next sailing trip and ensure safe passage by avoiding bad weather at sea
• Wing Foiling - Catch the best wind
• Surfing – find the perfect wave and high swell
• Dinghy sailing & regatta racers – prepare carefully for your next regatta
• SUP & Kayak – make sure high waves and wind don’t risk your adventures
• Paragliding – find a good wind right from the start
• Fishing – ensure a good catch with wind directions and tides
• Cycling, hiking & trekking – check if it will be windy on your route and take the right clothes and gear
• Boat owners & captains – keep an eye on the current wind conditions and tides
• ... anyone interested in reliable wind and weather predictions


WINDFINDER PLUS:

Subscribe to Windfinder Plus to get access to all features. With Windfinder Plus you also get:
+ Wind alerts: Specify your preferred wind conditions and get notified when windy or calm days are forecasted
+ Superforecast: our hourly high-resolution forecasting model for North America, Europe, South Africa, Egypt and the Canary Islands
+ Wind & Weather Widgets in all sizes with wind preview
+ Ad free: no distractions
+ Wind preview: get a quick visual overview of the next ten days
+ New: Value grid for weather parameters directly on the map
+ Animated wind speed maps with wind gusts, temperature, precipitation and topographic images
+ Wind report map: Real-time wind measurements from over 21,000 stations directly on the wind map
+ all webcams in the area
+ many more

Windfinder Plus is available as an In App Purchase.

Subscriptions:
Windfinder Plus: We offer auto-renewable "Windfinder Plus" subscriptions for one month or one year. The subscription unlocks the full feature set of Windfinder Plus.
Remove Ads: We offer auto-renewable "Remove Ads" subscriptions for 3 months, 6 months or one year. The app will be free of ads while the "Remove Ads" subscription is active.

Details:
A free trial period of 7 days is offered. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. You will be charged for another period (1 month, 3 months, 6 months or one year) unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the subscription is renewed. You can turn off the auto-renewal in your account settings after purchase.

Built by a small team, Rain Viewer delivers the most accurate and immediate short-term rain predictions straight from raw radar data. No third-party providers - our independent, professional-grade processing is trusted by millions of users, countless indie developers, and major weather companies. Dive into weather with unmatched detail, real-time data, and a sleek, modern interface designed specifically for weather enthusiasts.

Why Rain Viewer?
• Ultimate Precision & Speed: Maximum resolution radar data at original quality, delivered instantly from weather radars with zero delay. Professional radar products, including reflectivity, velocity, spectrum width, differential reflectivity, differential phase, correlation coefficient, and more, across all available tilts for US and selected European weather radars.
• Professional Experience: 48-hour radar history, 2-hour forecasts (5-minute updates), and long-term models (ICON, ICON-EU, GFS, HRRR, ECMWF) for 72-hour precipitation/temperature data, plus 72-hour hourly forecasts and 14-day daily outlook.
• Independent Data: We process every pixel in-house, pulling raw radar feeds for a completely autonomous weather view.
• Modern UX: Intuitive, clean interface with Metal-powered 60fps vector maps and unique precipitation direction arrows showing real-time storm movement.
• Total Customisation: Fine-tune alerts, thresholds, colour schemes, and multi-location settings to your exact specifications.

Advanced Tools:
• Completely free standalone Apple Watch app with radar, satellite maps, forecasts, severe alerts, and complications - fully functional without an iPhone.
• Free weather radar widgets for home and lock screens with precipitation direction arrows.
• Live Activities with dynamic minute-by-minute rain intensity graphs.
• Severe weather alerts directly from National Weather Services.
• Best-in-class hurricane tracking with timed alerts telling you exactly when the hurricane will be closest to your location.

Your Privacy, Our Promise:
No data collection or sales. Location used solely for forecasts and alerts. Every installation starts fresh - no user history stored.

Join millions who trust Rain Viewer for storm chasing, hiking, or planning outdoor activities. See precipitation with precision and clarity.

PRO Plan: Monthly: £8.99 | Quarterly: £19.99 | Annual: £39.99 (Auto-renewal can be disabled in App Store settings).

Privacy: https://rainviewer.com/privacy.html
Terms: https://rainviewer.com/terms.html

Windy.app - wind, waves and weather forecast app for surfers, kitesurfers, windsurfers, sailors, fishermen and other wind sports. 

FEATURES:
•  Wind report, forecast and statistics: wind map, accurate wind compass, wind meter, wind gusts and wind directions. It’s very useful for extreme wind sports.
•  Wind alert: Set up windalert and be aware of wind, storm and tornado warning via push-notifications
•  Weather history (archive) for 2012-2024: view wind data, temperature (day and night) and atmospheric pressure. Weather archive will help you to choose the best month for travel to the spot.
•  Local forecast from NOAA: temperature in Celsius, Fahrenheit and Kelvin, humidity, wind speed, precipitation (rain and snow). Forecast for 10 days with 3 hours step in metric or imperial units: m/s (mps), mph, km/h, knt (knout), bft (beaufort), m, ft, mm, cm, in, hPa, inHg. NOAA is a National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration / National Weather Service (nws).
•  Wave forecast: ocean or sea conditions, ocean waves and sea swell, fishing forecast
•  Animated wind tracker: weather radar for sailing, yachting and kiting in light wind
•  Cloud base/Dewpoint (dew point) data: necessary weather information for pleasant paragliding 
•  Spots: over 30.000 spots sorted and located by the type and area. Add your spots to favourites.
•  Spot chats. Got anemometer? Share info about weather conditions and wind direction in the chat from a kite spot.
•  Community: exchange weather reports on the spot. Want to be a local/spot leader? Email us the name of your spot at feedback@catchwind.co and we will create a chat for it.
•  Weather Stations: online data from nearby online weather stations.
•  Offline Mode: activate offline mode and check the forecast for your activities without internet connection.

PERFECT FOR:
• Kitesurfing (kitesurf)
• Windsurfing (wind surf)
• Surfing
• Sailing (Boating)
• Yachting
• Paragliding
• Fishing
• Snowkiting 
• Snowboarding
• Skiing
• Skydiving
• Kayaking (kayak)
• Wakeboarding
• Cycling
• Hunting (hunt)
• Golf

Cancelling the trial period will immediately disable your subscription.
Payment for subscription renewals will be charged to your account within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can disable subscription renewal in your iTunes account settings on your device.

Why should one install a weather application? There is already one built into the phone as you get it from the store. 

However, some people want to use the same application on their phone and tablet, some want bigger type and more contrast in app design, some people come from countries that use different measurement units - specific needs might be different.

Then, just curiosity and pursuit of the new options do their job.

Weather & Climate Tracker is a simple tool to check the current weather and temperature in your location. It combines a beautiful design with the latest technologies for an optimal user experience. With this app you get all relevant weather data at a glance.

This app could be your personal weather guru. It is a simple and elegant application designed with a high attention to details, ensuring its users will always stay up-to-date with the latest local weather forecast for the city of their choice. The app has been designed with a clean and minimalistic design, but at the same time providing all the information one needs about the current weather conditions, as well as detailed information on temperature, wind speed and direction, etc.

Weather & Climate Tracker is a high-contrast weather app, which can be really useful for individuals living with low vision, color blindness or visual impairment. The app includes a dynamic Type version and large text that makes for clear viewing and easy reading. 
The app can be used with Accessibility features like VoiceOver and Spoken Content.

Familiar interface on all devices you own, high contrast, all details big enough for everyone to notice - this could be the right weather app for you.

Terms of Use: https://appstea.com/legal/terms-of-use/

- Welcome to Marine Weather – Your Ultimate Maritime Companion -

Marine Weather is the essential app for everyone heading out to the water. Whether you’re a sailor navigating the open sea, a fisherman seeking the perfect catch, a surfer chasing the best waves, or a kiteboarder looking for optimal wind conditions, this app provides the tools and information you need to stay informed and safe.

With accurate and real-time wind, wave, and weather predictions, Marine Weather ensures you are always prepared for your maritime adventures. Designed with a professional and intuitive user interface, the app offers a seamless experience, allowing you to access critical information quickly and efficiently.

- Key Features to Elevate Your Maritime Experience -

Accurate Wind, Wave, and Weather Predictions:
Stay informed with reliable and up-to-date forecasts for wind, waves, and weather conditions. Marine Weather ensures you have the data needed to make informed decisions, whether you’re planning a quick trip or a multi-day voyage.

Intuitive Wind, Wave, and Weather Charts:
Visualize the conditions in real-time with detailed and easy-to-read charts. These charts provide a clear and concise overview, making it simple to assess current conditions at a glance and plan accordingly.

Effortless Station Search with Custom Suggestions:
Find nearby buoy stations or search for specific locations with ease. Can’t find what you’re looking for? Suggest new stations directly within the app to expand its reach and usefulness.

Manage Your Favorite Stations for Quick Access:
Save your most-used stations to your favorites for faster access. This feature is perfect for regular users who need to check the same locations repeatedly without searching every time.

Comprehensive Map of Buoy Stations:
Access a detailed map displaying all available buoy stations. Whether you’re planning a coastal trip or exploring offshore, this feature provides a clear view of conditions across a wide area.

Customizable Subscription Plans:
Unlock additional features and functionality with flexible subscription options. Tailor the app to your needs with plans that enhance your experience and provide premium tools for advanced forecasting.

- Why Choose Marine Weather? -

Marine Weather isn’t just another weather app – it’s your go-to resource for maritime safety and planning. Whether you’re navigating, fishing, surfing, or just enjoying a day on the water, Marine Weather empowers you with real-time information and actionable insights.

Here’s what makes Marine Weather stand out:

Comprehensive and reliable data for wind, swell, and weather.
A user-friendly design that prioritizes simplicity and clarity.
Tools tailored to meet the needs of water sports enthusiasts, fishermen, and sailors alike.
Customizable features that let you optimize the app for your specific activities.
Regular updates to ensure accuracy and reliability.
- Perfect for All Water Enthusiasts -

Marine Weather is the ideal companion for:

Sailors: Navigate safely with real-time wind and wave updates.
Fishermen: Plan your trips with accurate weather data.
Surfers: Find the best swell conditions for your next ride.
Kiteboarders: Optimize your sessions with precise wind predictions.
Maritime Professionals: Stay prepared with detailed weather insights.

- Subscription Plans for Enhanced Features -

Marine Weather offers flexible subscription options designed to enhance your experience. Unlock premium features like advanced forecasting tools, additional data layers, and more to ensure you have everything you need for your time on the water.

Stay Ahead of the Weather with Accurate Weather & Forecasts!

Get the most accurate and reliable weather updates right at your fingertips. Whether you're planning your day, your week, or your next big adventure, Accurate Weather & Forecasts provides all the information you need to make informed decisions. With real-time data, detailed forecasts, and a user-friendly interface, Accurate Weather & Forecasts is your go-to weather companion.

Key Features:

1. Real-Time Weather Updates
Receive up-to-the-minute weather data for your current location or any city around the world. Never be caught off guard by unexpected weather changes.

2. Detailed Hourly Forecasts
Plan your day with precision using our comprehensive hourly weather forecasts. Get a breakdown of temperature, precipitation, humidity, and wind speed for every hour of the day.

3. 15-Day Weather Forecast
Look ahead with confidence using our 15-day weather forecast. Perfect for planning long trips, outdoor events, or simply staying prepared for what's coming.

4. Air Quality Index
Keep track of the air quality in your area with real-time AQI updates. Ideal for individuals sensitive to pollution or anyone who wants to stay informed about the air they breathe.

5. Allergy Risk Levels
Monitor pollen levels, mold spores, and other allergens in your area. Get alerts on high-risk days so you can take precautions and manage your allergies effectively.

6. Indices & Activity Forecasts
Get specialized forecasts that include outdoor activity index, jogging forecast, stargazing conditions, driving travel index, and more. Make the most of your day with tailored insights.

7. Detailed Weather Reports
Access in-depth weather reports with daily details, including temperature highs and lows, wind speed, UV index, precipitation, and more. Stay informed about every aspect of the weather.

8. Manage & Search Locations
Easily manage multiple locations and quickly search for any city to get accurate weather information. Perfect for travelers and those who need to stay updated on different locations.

9. Widgets for Quick Access
Stay informed at a glance with our customizable weather widgets. Get real-time weather updates, hourly forecasts, or air quality information directly on your home screen without opening the app.

10. User-Friendly Interface
Enjoy a clean, intuitive design that makes it easy to navigate through all the features. Whether you're a casual user or a weather enthusiast, Accurate Weather & Forecasts offers an experience tailored to your needs.

Why Choose Accurate Weather & Forecasts?

Reliability: Powered by top-notch weather data sources to ensure you always get the most accurate forecasts.
Comprehensive: From real-time updates to detailed reports, this app covers all your weather needs.
Convenience: Access all features with ease, including widgets for instant access to weather updates.
Download Accurate Weather & Forecasts today and make sure you're always one step ahead of the weather!

All the information you need to know to plan activities at sea in a simple and practical app.

More than 25,000 coastal stations around the world.

TIDES
Daily tide charts and tidal coefficient. High tides and low tides. Tides height. Monthly tide table. Tides for fishing.

SURF
Height and direction of the swell, wave period, hourly surf table.

FISH ACTIVITY
Hourly activity chart and solunar periods with the best fishing moments of every day. Monthly activity table with daily fish activity and major and minor fishing periods.

SUN AND MOON
Sunrise, sunset, moonrise, moonset, azimut, moon phases, eclipses, transits and other astronomical data.

BAROMETER
Fishing barometer, pressure graph and hourly pressure table with trend indicator.

WIND
Wind at land and wind at sea: wind speed, wind gust, wind force, land and sea conditions and hourly wind table.

WEATHER
Weather conditions at coast: Cloud cover, visibility, temperature, precipitation, wind chill, humidity, dew point and hourly weather table.

MARINE
Open water forecast for marine/sailing. Includes all weather indicators and also the water temp. Hourly marine table.

AIR QUALITY
Major air pollutants, particulate matter, hour-by-hour forecast.

OpenSnow is your trusted source for the most accurate forecast, snow report, and severe weather maps.

"Weather forecasting for the mountains takes extra focus, analysis, and precision, which is exactly what OpenSnow provides. The app is incredible, even for super weather nerds like myself." – Cody Townsend, Pro Skier

PEAKS + StormNet

PEAKS is our proprietary weather forecast system that is up to 50% more accurate in mountain terrain. StormNet is our severe weather forecast system that produces real-time, high-resolution forecasts for lightning, hail, damaging winds, and tornadoes. Combined, PEAKS + StormNet provide a first-of-its-kind, fully operational multi-component AI-powered weather forecast system.

15-Day Forecasts

Finding the location that has the best conditions can feel overwhelming. With OpenSnow, deciding where to go is easy. View the latest 15-day multi-model weather forecast, snow report, and mountain cams for your favorite locations in just a few seconds.

Local "Daily Snow" Experts

Instead of spending hours sifting through weather data, get the inside scoop in just a few minutes. Our local experts write a new “Daily Snow” forecast each day for regions around the US, Canada, Europe, Australia, and New Zealand. Have one of our expert local forecasters guide you to the best conditions.

3D & Offline Maps

We make it easy to track incoming storms with super-res radar and global precipitation, radar, and snowfall maps. You can also view 3D maps for snow depth, avalanche risk, active fire perimeters, air quality, wildfire smoke, public and private land ownership, and more. Download high-resolution satellite maps to view offline.

Daily Features

• 15-Day Hourly Forecasts
• Current & Forecast Radar
• Air Quality Forecasts
• Wildfire Smoke Forecast Maps
• 50,000+ Weather Stations
• 3D & Offline Satellite Maps
• Estimated Trail Conditions
• Land Boundary & Ownership Maps

Snow & Ski Features

• 15-Day Snow Forecast
• Snow Depth Map
• Season Snowfall Map
• Snow Forecast Alerts
• Snow Forecast Maps
• Offline Ski Resort Trail Maps
• Snow Forecast & Report Widgets
• Historical Snow Reports

Severe Weather Features (US only)

• Super-Res Radar
• Lightning Risk
• Tornado Risk
• Hail Risk
• Damaging Winds Risk
• Severe Weather Alerts

Free Features

• My Location 15-Day Forecast
• Snow Forecast 15-Day Summary
• Snow Report Alerts
• Active Fires & Fire Perimeter Map
• Avalanche Forecast

— Free Trial —

New accounts will automatically receive the full OpenSnow experience, with no credit card or payment information required. If you choose not to purchase OpenSnow after the free trial is over, you will be automatically downgraded to a free account and not charged. You will still be able to compare snow reports and view weather forecasts.

— In-App Purchase —

OpenSnow Base is an auto-renewable subscription, which will renew yearly at $49.99 USD. Payment will be charged to the user's Apple account at confirmation of purchase. The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. The account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and identify the cost of the renewal. If the auto-renewal fails due to a payment issue, you will still be able to access the paid content for 16 days while Apple attempts to collect payment. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.

Your Global Weather Companion Across Every Horizon ArabiaWeather delivers precision beyond borders—accurate forecasts for the Arab world and every corner of the globe. Available in Arabic and English, we empower you to master your day, whether you're facing rain, snow, storms, or hurricanes. From personalized clothing recommendations to activity planning, our app transforms weather uncertainty into confident living. Connect with our Raseed community, explore nature, share your weather experiences in the past and present, and even predict tomorrow all within a single, powerful application.


Weather intelligence at your fingertips with hyperlocal and global insights, ArabiaWeather provides hourly forecasts and personalized lifestyle recommendations. Stay informed, prepared, and ahead—wherever you are.


Weather Forecasts


Precision Weather Forecasting: Your Day, Decoded
Navigate life with confidence through our comprehensive daily and hourly weather intelligence. From dawn to dusk, get a complete atmospheric snapshot including precise temperature readings, "feels like" conditions, humidity levels, wind dynamics, and rain probability. Plan your day with certainty, whether you're preparing for work, leisure, or adventure—ArabiaWeather puts the power of prediction in your hands.



Satellite Vision
Dive into visual forecasting that goes beyond traditional predictions. Trace and detect emerging fog banks, dust storms, and monitor cloud top temperatures. With our satellite technology, you're not just watching the weather; you're anticipating its every move, staying perpetually one step ahead of nature's unpredictable choreography.


WIDGETS


Small but mighty, our widgets transform your home screen into a powerful meteorological dashboard. With a single glance, stay ahead of weather intelligence that keeps you informed, prepared, and one step ahead of whatever the sky has planned.




Raseed: Your Weather Community, Your Meteorological Voice


Transform from a weather observer to a citizen scientist with Raseed, ArabiaWeather's interactive community platform. Share captivating stories, stunning images, and insightful voice notes about local weather phenomena, historical climate patterns, and your own weather predictions. Become more than just a user—become a passionate weather forecaster, connecting with like-minded enthusiasts and contributing to a global network of atmospheric storytellers. Your observations matter, your insights count, and your weather journey starts here.



Lifestyle: Your Personalized Weather Guide


Activities: Plan your day with weather-smart activity suggestions. ArabiaWeather turns unpredictable conditions into opportunities, helping you choose activities that align with the forecast.
Health: Stay ahead of health risks like headaches, allergies, or colds with predictive alerts. Protect yourself and your loved ones through proactive weather-driven insights.
Clothing: Get personalized outfit recommendations for every temperature change. Whether it’s a sunny day or a chilly evening, dress comfortably and confidently with ArabiaWeather.
